document_data.name: Celebration
document_data.Effects: During casting, the caster sang a drinking song. Any creature within {{SI|15|ft}} of the caster began to feel intoxicated. The longer they were within the range of the spell the worse it got. The effects persisted for a while even after the spell expired or if a creature left the area. If a creature entered within the area they were not afflicted with intoxication.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
